fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the regulatory compliance control

fields.name: FailedAssessments
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a failed state

fields.name: PassedAssessments
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a passed state

fields.name: SkippedAssessments
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance assessments of the given control with a skipped state

fields.name: State
fields.description: Aggregative state based on the control's supported assessments states
